# view

**Instance Property**

The view displayed in the bar to represent this item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var view: NSView { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property returns the value of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewController/view] property from the view controller assigned to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCustomTouchBarItem/viewController] property.

If you set the value of this property, then the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCustomTouchBarItem/viewController] property is automatically set to `nil`.

## Providing item content

- **viewController**: A view controller whose view is displayed in the bar to represent this item.
